entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
